diff_hunk:
@@ -1541,7 +1546,7 @@ def _gif():
       channels_msg = 'Channels must be in (None, 0, 3) when decoding GIF images'
       assert_channels = control_flow_ops.Assert(good_channels, [channels_msg])
       with ops.control_dependencies([assert_channels]):
-        return gen_image_ops.decode_gif(contents)
+        return convert_image_dtype(gen_image_ops.decode_gif(contents), dtype)
body: We can probably remove `convert_image_dtype` calls from each of these helper functions and instead do it once at the end so that this function will now support types other than `uint8` and `uint16` for all image formats.
body_html: We can probably remove convert_image_dtype calls from each of these helper functions and instead do it once at the end so that this function will now support types other than uint8 and uint16 for all image formats.
body_text: We can probably remove convert_image_dtype calls from each of these helper functions and instead do it once at the end so that this function will now support types other than uint8 and uint16 for all image formats.
